text: It seems likely that many of the young who don't wait for others to call them artists, but simply announce that they are, don't have the patience to make art.
author: Pauline Kael

text: Tolerance, compromise, understanding, acceptance, patience - I want those all to be very sharp tools in my shed.
author: Cee Lo Green

text: The patience of the American public with dilatory diplomatic delays will be very limited.
author: Tom Lantos

text: I wish I was a shredder that could play everything, but I don't have the patience.
author: Dave Navarro
